CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV , MOT , and CHI enter the room . INV explains the warm-up task to MOT . CHI stands and looks at the toys in the room
CHI turns and watches INV leave
MOT puts her bag down behind the door
MOT puts CHI's coat on top of the bag
CHI turns and looks at the toys

INV enters to explain Small Scale Activity to MOT
INV has MOT put CHI at the table as she clears away the toys from Warm-up .
INV leaves the room while Small Scale Activity takes place
INV re-enters and explains the Forbidden Object task to MOT .
INV clears the toys from Small Scale Activity and has MOT sit next to CHI at the table . INV gives CHI the brush to hold
